name: America 2018
description:
A bleak and dystopian FPS made for Ludum Dare 40 compo. You need to collect stars to gain score but the more you do so, the more monsters will be spawned!

PS. The monsters are definitely up to no good :(

Use WASD and left mouse button to control.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/america-2018/
